20101213013709.500|20101213013710.750|CCO|THE SCANDAL, AND THOSE WHO KNEW 
20101213013710.750|20101213013712.000|CCO|HIM TELL US HE HAD LOST HOPE AND
20101213013712.000|20101213013713.667|CCO|MAY HAVE BEEN CONSIDERING 
20101213013713.667|20101213013715.333|CCO|SUICIDE FOR SOME TIME.
